front.title: •Apology Accepted
front.gametext: At the end of any battle phase, lose one of your Imperials of ability < 6 who survived a battle you lost this turn. Activate Force up to either that character's forfeit value or the amount of your battle damage in that battle.
front.lore: 'I shall assume full responsibility for losing them and apologize to Lord Vader.' Needa discovered that Vader was only slightly more forgiving than the Emperor.
